abstract: Analysis holds that NBA commissioner David Stern must balance conflicting interests and increasing risks amid lockout, asserting that it is up to league's chief executive to always act for the good of the game.
snippet: Commissioner David Stern must balance conflicting interests and increasing risks amid a lockout.
lead_paragraph: Commissioner David Stern must balance conflicting interests and increasing risks amid a lockout.

headline.main: Stern Must Balance N.B.A.’s Viability and Visibility
headline.print_headline: Trying to Better N.B.A.’s Viability, and Risking Its Visibility
headline.seo: Stern Must Balance N.B.A.’s Viability and Visibility
